about_the_game:
In FUCK HITLER your task is to torture Adolf Hitler and get as many points as possible using a wide variety of blocks and weapons.

GAMEPLAY

In the game you can build your own torture constructions, create an infinite number of Hitlers and inflict suffering on him with firearms and white weapons, for which you receive points.

LEADERBOARD

All the points earned in the game are added up and then recorded in the global leaderboard. Perhaps it is YOU who will find yourself at the top of it!

PHOTO MODE

You can stop the game at any time using the advanced photo mode to take the perfect shot and share it with the community.

STEAM WORKSHOP

The game has support for Steam Workshop. Download maps created by the community or add your own creations.

highlighted.name: EIN VOLK, EIN REICH, EINTAUSEND FÜHRER

content_descriptors.notes: The game features large amounts of blood, violence, and deadly weapons.

detailed_description:
In FUCK HITLER your task is to torture Adolf Hitler and get as many points as possible using a wide variety of blocks and weapons.

GAMEPLAY

In the game you can build your own torture constructions, create an infinite number of Hitlers and inflict suffering on him with firearms and white weapons, for which you receive points.

LEADERBOARD

All the points earned in the game are added up and then recorded in the global leaderboard. Perhaps it is YOU who will find yourself at the top of it!

PHOTO MODE

You can stop the game at any time using the advanced photo mode to take the perfect shot and share it with the community.

STEAM WORKSHOP

The game has support for Steam Workshop. Download maps created by the community or add your own creations.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 and newer recommended
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 and newer recommended
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: FUCK HITLER

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7; 64-Bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 10, Windows 11; 64-Bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Adolf Hitler almost 80 years after his death returns to suffer punishment for the Holocaust and his other crimes by becoming the object of torture for thousands of gamers from around the world.
supported_languages: English, Polish, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Finnish, Dutch, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Swedish, Turkish, Ukrainian, Icelandic, Arabic, Greek, Lithuanian, Bulgarian, Czech, Japanese, Norwegian, Romanian, Vietnamese, Hungarian, Belarusian, Croatian, Slovak, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Danish, Spanish - Latin America, Indonesian, Korean, Thai
